name: Syncio
description: Syncio is a comprehensive management system for Stremio addons and users. Organize users into groups, install and manage Stremio addons, keep addons synchronized across all users' accounts, and control access with authentication. Features include group management, addon management with resource filtering, smart sync, protected addons, import/export capabilities, and a modern responsive UI with multiple themes.
